com.android.locationtracker.data

Class TrackerDataHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.locationtracker.data.TrackerDataHelper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TrackerListHelper

    public class TrackerDataHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for writing and retrieving data using the TrackerProvider content provider
